name: The King's Gambit
description:
This sticker pack contains 33 animated stickers with the most advanced chess openings. Each sticker is animated in an endless loop with 1 move/second to easily follow and memorize the opening. Additionally, each move is shown in standard algebraic notation (SAN). The stickers can be resized to your needs by pinching them before dropping them onto a message bubble.

INCLUDED CHESS OPENINGS
+ Sicilian Defense
+ Sicilian Defense: Closed
+ Sicilian Defense: Alapin Variation
+ French Defense
+ Ruy Lopez Opening
+ Italian Game
+ Caro-Kann Defense
+ Scandinavian Defense
+ Pirc Defense
+ Alekhine Defense
+ King's Gambit
+ Scotch Game
+ Queen's Gambit
+ Slav Defense
+ King's Indian Defense
+ Nimzo-Indian Defense
+ Queen's Indian Defense
+ Bogo-Indian Defense
+ Gruenfeld Defense
+ Dutch Defense
+ Trompowsky Attack
+ Benko Gambit
+ Queen's Pawn Opening: London System
+ Benoni Defense: Modern Variation
+ Catalan Opening
+ Reti Opening
+ English Opening
+ Bird's Opening
+ King's Indian Attack
+ Hungarian Opening
+ Nimzowitsch-Larsen Attack
+ Polish Opening
+ Grob Opening

HOW TO USE
1) Open or start a conversation in iMessage
2) Tap the `Chess Opening Stickers` app icon in the bottom bar
3) Tap on any sticker to add it to your message box
4) Or drag & drop the sticker over any message bubble
5) Pinch to resize or rotate before dropping the stickers

HOW TO UNINSTALL
1) Open or start a conversation in iMessage
2) Tap the three dots in the bottom bar
3) Search for the `Chess Opening Stickers` app icon and slide this row to the left
4) Tap the delete button
